name: ECO BLACK™ EB 540 Reinforcing Filler For Rubber Applications
description: ECO BLACK™ EB 540 is a solid black powder material, featuring high structure and porosity, and high carbon content. Useful in its primary state as filler for rubber articles, pigment in paints and solid fuel. Originated from discarded tires treated by pyrolysis, in an exhaustively controlled process to obtain the best quality particulate material. This material presents productive improvements due to its low cost and environmental commitment.
